patthana21.49:1.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.49:2.1: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.49:3.1: (Naāsavañceva naanāsavaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi purimanayena tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.49:4.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
